armor_visibility.options.keep_elytra_vis: Keep Elytra visible when armor is toggled hidden.
armor_visibility.options.keep_cape_visib: Keep player capes visible when armor is toggled hidden.
armor_visibility.options.players_only.to: Don't change the visibility of armor on mobs (armor stands, zombies, etc.).
If on, toggling armor visibility toggles the visibility of helmets.
armor_visibility.options.toggles_chestpl: If on, toggling armor visibility toggles the visibility of chestplates.
armor_visibility.options.toggles_legging: If on, toggling armor visibility toggles the visibility of leggings.
armor_visibility.options.toggles_boots.t: If on, toggling armor visibility toggles the visibility of boots.
armor_visibility.options.save_between_la: If on, the armor visibility toggle's state will save between launches. So if you quit the game with armor hidden, when you open the game later it will still be hidden.
